channel.title: Interest Rates on
channel.description: Recent content in Interest Rates on

item.title: How do interest rates affect the way my mortgage is paid off?
item.description: With a baby on the way my wife and I have become very interested in the interest rate on our mortgage, and how it might go up or down, and how that will affect whether we overpay to build up some equity, etc. etc. etc. As you will know if you’ve ever thought about your mortgage payments, it’s all quite complicated and difficult to think about.
